data.eml:eml: Description of five new rheophilic Orthochromis species (Teleostei: Cichlidae) from the Upper Congo drainage in Zambia and the Democratic Republic of the Congo

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schedel, Frederic Dieter Benedikt, Vreven, Emmanuel J. W. M. N., Manda, Bauchet Katemo, Abwe, Emmanuel, Manda, Auguste Chocha, Schliewen, Ulrich Kurt (2018): Description of five new rheophilic Orthochromis species (Teleostei: Cichlidae) from the Upper Congo drainage in Zambia and the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Zootaxa 4461 (3): 301-349, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4461.3.1
